recipesJson.name: Rainbow milk
recipesJson.author: Slushy
recipesJson.description: Ok so this is my take on cereal milk shout out to all the mixers who attempted this profile "Teleos the milk" I have mixed all of them and honestly I couldn't taste them I dont have taste buds like @JenniferJarvis lol. Go check her out seriously she is awesome. Doing my research on the original and countless mixed reviews I have developed my own version to me this is what a cereal milk should taste like hope you enjoy this mix as much as I do...üëç
